tooltip.relics.tendon_lump.description: +1 experience point for each «Tendon» ability activation.
tooltip.relics.tendon_lump.ability.tendo: Fires a tendon at a random nearby target that bounces between nearby targets and deals damage to them. Additionally applies attack modifiers if the wearer's hand is equipped with a Tendon Whip.
tooltip.relics.frost_robe.description:
+1 experience point for each «Frost Spikes» ability activation.
+1 experience point for each hit with an icicle from the ability «Frost Spikes».
tooltip.relics.frost_robe.ability.warmin: Prevents frostbite and allows you to walk on blocks of powder snow.
tooltip.relics.frost_robe.ability.icicle: Scatters a random number of icicles in a random direction, causing damage to targets.
tooltip.relics.frost_robe.ability.freeze: Each time the wearer receives damage, it has a chance to use the «Frost Spikes» ability and applies a cumulative frostbite effect to the attacker.
tooltip.relics.stink_gland.description:
+1 experience point per each second of «Biological Protection» ability work.
+1 experience point for each activation of «Foul Dash».
tooltip.relics.stink_gland.ability.defen: When the wearer's health level drops below 20% for a certain time it scatters a foul miasma everywhere, inflicting a nausea effect and forcing nearby mobs to attack targets.
Dashes in the direction of view, leaving behind a foul cloud that inflicts a nausea effect and forces nearby mobs to attack the target.
